channel.title: How do i Improve On Switching? (PI)
channel.description:
ive been coding a Source for quite sometime and failed to notice that the switching is terrible, Switching as in when you want to switch to another gear. Its something hybrids use All the time, Can anybody tell me what file to start at? where it is located or how do i begin coding it?
Thanks.

@Kidpaparoach wrote:

simplest thing is to change the delay timer, there is one. Theres a mini guide telling you where it is. donâ€™t change it too much as it can cause switches to be too fast also i think it has an affect on rushing and eating speeds.
